titleInfo.title: I'M KELDON RUSH
subTitles: I really enjoy making cool things - A LOT!!
I *love* learning new things & sharing things I've learned

aboutInfo.title: ABOUT ME
aboutInfo.subTitle: a brief introduction
aboutInfo.myRole: Experience Engineer / Front End Web Developer
htmlBlurbs: I started out in the software industry at Microsoft as a Technical Media Designer.  The technical part started to grow as I became the manager of a team of Technical Media Designers.
I transitioned to the role of Program Manager at Microsoft and I continued to contribute more and more code to the projects I was managing.
I spent the next four years as a technical Program Manager at two startups where my contributions as a web developer increased.

Next at Smashing Ideas I was the Director of the Platforms & Technologies Division.  I was a core developer on the team as well as managing the team and customer relationships.  Our customers included MTV, Disney, at&t, T-Mobile, Verizon, Nokia, Adobe, and Microsoft.
During that time one of the startups was purchased (Nuance Buys SNAPin) and with my proceeds I started Spiral9.

Spiral9 was a 14 person company focused on providing ideation, design, development services.  Our main customers were Adobe, TiVo, Cisco, Facebook, Disney, and SNAPin.  Our projects were nearly all TV and set-top-box related.  We rode a very interesting bubble as we helped our customers explore the next evolution of Connected TV.
In 2011 that bubble popped and since then I have been mainly focused on front end web development.
BTW, I developed this responsive angular app that you are using right now.
In this app I am using :

• AngularJS 1.4.7
  • D3.js - Data-Driven Documents
  • Font Awesome - Font & CSS Toolkit
  • Google Font API - Web Fonts via CSS
  • GSAP - GreenSock Animation Platform
  • Bootstrap - HTML, CSS, and JS framework
In this app's toolchain I am using :

• LESS - CSS preprocessor (w/ plugin : less-plugin-glob)
  • npm - JS package manager
  • gulp - streaming build system
  • bower - package manager
  • git - source control (via github)
  • jasmine - test runner
  • I developed the project using Intellij IDEA

You can check out the source on github here :
  https://github.com/rushkeldon/spiral9_website

workInfo.title: WORK EXPERIENCE
workInfo.subTitle: Some of my experiences creating experiences

events.title: Holland America Group
events.bodyHTML:
Extensively refactored the Angular service for the shopping cart and checkout flow for two sites while supporting multiple languages, currencies, and a whole boat load of business logic.

Helped to convert the home pages and other key components of hollandamerica.com and seabourn.com to a responsive Angular application.
